Looking for a place to grow, learn and meet new challenges?

BUILD YOUR FUTURE WITH US

Be part of the innovative and high performance culture at TriAset. A leading role in developing extraordinary software solutions that connect the world’s most important information and enable today’s businesses to run in the most efficient manner possible. We inspire real value for our clients in a team-empowered, solutions-focused work environment that encourages fresh ideas, new ways of thinking, and diverse experiences. If you are looking for a challenging, creative working environment - at TriAset, this is the job for you. We understand that our employees are responsible for our success, and we work hard to reward the contributions of our project teams as well as acknowledge individual accomplishments. If you enjoy taking responsibility, be part of a growing developing company, a team player, and achieving excellence, we invite you to join us.

Account Manager

(Sales & Marketing)

Education / Experience

  • Minimum 2 years of Account Management and Marketing experience.
  • The successful candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree in Finance, Economics, Business Administration, Marketing, Computer Science, Management Information System, Mathematics, Physics & Engineering, or related degrees.

Summary of Position

  • Ensure an effective and efficient first point of contact for clients with company.
  • To identify and create leads for all business development prospects besides maintaining a close professional relationship with influential parties concerned.
  • To build a reliable and comprehensive data base of prospects and customers for the Company.
  • Maintain company's professional image through all interactions with clients and ensure that clients' satisfaction is realized.
  • To execute the necessary Marketing programs and activities in the total business development and Sales process.
  • Involve directly and/or indirectly in enhancing the system to meet new markets' and/or clients' requirements.
  • Keep abreast and improve skills and knowledge in both technology and business requirements.

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Excellent presentation skills including both development and delivery.
  • Ability to excel in ambiguous technical and business situations by adapting plans and approach; analytical and organizational skills, negotiation, judgment and decision-making skills.
  • Excellent interpersonal skills to build and maintain positive working relationships across groups and all management levels.
  • Outstanding time-management skills and a demonstrated ability to work independently as well as in a team environment to meet deadlines while juggling many projects and priorities simultaneously.
  • Results oriented, energetic and focused with a strong desire to learn and succeed.
  • Develop and maintain a deep understanding of your client base.
  • Build and maintain relationships with a list of dedicated clients and provide ongoing strategic consultation and support.

Send us your resume

Software Engineer

Education / Experience

  • Minimum 1-7 years of related industries experience. Fresh graduates/Entry level applicants are encouraged to apply.
  • The successful candidate must possessformal tertiary education with either a Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, Accounting or equivalent.
  • Experience in software development using Visual Basic, Visual C++ and/or Visual Studio.Net.

Summary of Position

  • Full lifecycle application development.
  • Designing, coding and debugging applications using Visual Basic, Visual C++ and/or Visual Studio.Net languages.
  • Software testing and quality assurance.
  • Performance tuning, improvement, balancing, usability, automation.
  • Support, maintain and document software functionality.
  • Integrate software with existing systems.
  • Project Planning and Project Management.

Roles and Responsibilities

  • The Software Engineer would be involved in the analysis, development, implementation and support of the software solutions of the company.
  • Strong analytic and problem solving skills.
  • Good communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to plan and work to deadlines.
  • Ability to work in a team and/or to lead a team.

Send us your resume

Administrative Assistant

Education / Experience

  • Handle general office administration tasks.
  • To attend to day-to-day administrative work in Finance & HR department.

Summary of Position

  • Minimum SPM / STPM or equivalent qualification.
  • 1 year working experience in the related field is required for this position , however, fresh graduates/entry level applicants are also encouraged to apply.
  • Computer literate and possess good command in MS Office suite of applications.
  • Good command of English & Bahasa Malaysia in both communication and writing skills.

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Good communication skills & pleasant personality required in handling telephone calls & front desk duties.
  • Data entry into UBS accounting software & HR payroll package.
  • Monitoring of time sheets & attendance report.
  • Assist in overseeing the smooth functionality & administration of the office.
  • Other administrative task in Finance & HR department.

Send us your resume

QA Engineer

Education / Experience

  • Experience in IT test documentation, writing automated test scripts and manual testing of software modules.
  • Audit product at different stages, report non-compliance and escalation.

Summary of Position

  • Min 2 years experience as Software Test Engineer following CMMI or ISO standards.
  • Degree or Diploma in IT/ Computer Science.
  • Good command in English (Written & Spoken).

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Responsible for Software Test planning, Software testing & verification of releases, deployment testing and Non compliance tracking.
  • Define/enhance quality assurance strategy and processes.
  • Recommend/implement measures to improve QA related processes in the areas of development, operations, production support of software development.
  • Implement and adopt standard processes and best practices to ensure efficient use of resources for on time delivery of applications.
  • Design, execute tests and verify test results.
  • Coordinate defect resolution activities, working with development and business teams.
  • Work with minimum supervision and must be a team player.

Send us your resume

Application Consultant

(Project Implementation)

Education / Experience

  • The Consultants would be involved in the analysis of business requirements & implementation of Investment & Treasury Solutions for our clients.

Summary of Position

  • Candidate must possess at least a Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree or Master's Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.
  • Undergraduates with outstanding academic records in Finance/Accountancy,Banking,Commerce, Mathematics, Financial Engineering , Sciences, and Engineering are also encouraged to apply.
  • Strong in financial mathematics or CFA qualification is an added advantage.
  • At least 2-3 years working experience however fresh graduates may also apply.
  • Experience in Treasury/Investment environment is desirable but not necessary.
  • Experience in working in a computing environment is an added advantage.
  • Required language(s): English, Bahasa Malaysia.

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Undertake analysis & mapping of client business requirements to application solutions.
  • Undertake Gap Analysis & design of solutions to meet client's requirements.
  • Involve in quality assurance of the solutions prior delivering to our clients.
  • Provide user training to our clients.
  • Conduct User Acceptance Testing with clients.
  • Able to work independently with minimum supervision & under pressure.
  • Applicants must be willing to travel overseas.
  • Good communication skills and interpersonal skills at all levels.

Send us your resume

Application Support Consultants

Education / Experience

  • Act as a first point of contact to our clients.
  • Involve in 1st and 2nd level of support on software application, databases and infrastructure issues.

Summary of Position

  • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology, Finance, Banking, Commerce or its equivalents.
  • At least 1 – 2 year of Application support or software development experiences.
  • Experience in Treasury/Investment/Insurance industry is an added advantage though not necessary.

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Provide internal or external training of solutions provided to clients.
  • Collaborate with development team to ensure the stability of software application and reports before delivering to our clients.
  • Involve in software application and reports troubleshooting and rectification of errors.
  • Involve in quality assurance of the solutions prior delivering to our clients.
  • Recommend solutions to clients on how to use application on issues reported.
  • Assist in enhancing the software application in meeting market requirements.
  • Required skill(s) : Microsoft .NET, VB, Microsoft SQL Server.
  • Knowledge in one of these reporting tools (Microsoft Reporting Services, Oracle Interactive Reporting or Crystal Report) is an advantage.
  • Ability to multi-task and prioritize tasks.
  • Ability to identify problems and issues encountered and highlight to manager.
  • Good Communication skills and interpersonal skill at all levels.
  • Able to work independently with minimum supervision & under pressure.
  • Willing to travel overseas.

Send us your resume
